description: Erection of a rear dormer including a small terrace and steel balustrade. New windows to replace existing on rear facade and the introduction of a rear facing juliet balcony on the first floor. Installation of rooflights on front roof slope
decision_conditions: <p>The proposed juliet balcony, by reason of inappropriate detailed design and form, would comprise an unsympathetic and discordant addition, which would harm the character and appearance of the application site, adjoining terrace and wider St Marks Conservation Area of which it forms part. The proposed development fails to meet the requirement&nbsp; meet the requirements of London Plan (2021) policies D4, HC1 and Hackney Local Plan (2020) policies LP1 and LP3 and Hackney's Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD<br></p>

<p>The proposed rooflights, by reason of design, location and scale, comprise an incongruous and discordant feature which would harm the character and appearance of the application site, adjoining terrace, streetscene of Colvestone Crescent and wider St Marks Conservation Area of which it forms part. The proposed development fails to meet the requirement&nbsp; meet the requirements of London Plan (2021) policies D4, HC1 and Hackney Local Plan (2020) policies LP1 and LP3 and Hackney's Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD.<br></p>
